# Getting Started with Python

Before running the commands in this book you should have the following software locally installed:

- Python from [Anaconda](https://www.anaconda.com/download)
- Start the Anaconda Navigator and open up [Jupyter Lab](https://jupyterlab.readthedocs.io/en/stable/)
- The workshop data repository can be found [here](https://github.com/Scavetta/DAwPy). Please download and unzip the file.
